vsParam:
Uh, are they Marjoram Sensei and...
Bergamot Sensei?

Oh? [px] and Peppermint, what's wrong?
Why are you so astonished... Is there anything wrong?

Feel free to ask me questions.
I'll teach you everything I know!

Don't spoil the students, Marjoram Sensei.
You must let them develop a habit of independent thinking...

Marjoram Sensei, you have a very
good relationship with Bergamot Sensei, right?

Ho ho, of course. We are about the same age. Actually, there's
a remarkable resemblance in character and ideas between us.

Oh, is that so? I feel that your personalities are very different.
It surprised me to see you get along so well.

Ha-ha, that's no true. Bergamot Sensei and I
have many things in common!

For example, let me think... Ah, right!
Ho ho ho.

Bergamot Sensei,
rarely compliments a student directly...

But she'd do it in private,
and say things like "Ho... They are doing good"! Is that kawaii?

What!? W, what are you saying,
Marjoram Sensei!

She said to me happily "that kid has a promising future,
I have faith in [px]" last time!

Th-that's enough! [px], the Alchemy Department and the
Wizardology Department will give you an assignment together!

Go kill the specified monster.
Go now!

It is an alchemist's responsibility to deal with urgent commissions.
Alright, just go! Right now!

We are... kicked out.
Must we do it...

Ho ho, welcome back. Good job!
Looks like you are safe and sound. That's great...

Who knows why Bergamot Sensei would
give students assignments so abruptly.

Perhaps that's because you revealed
Bergamot Sensei's hidden side suddenly...

But it's rare for us to see Bergamot Sensei getting nervous.
It's worth our efforts!

Ho ho, Bergamot Sensei has a face that you
can't even imagine. Would you like to know?

You are honest.
Then I shall tell [px] in secret.

No need to be afraid.
You'll be surprised! Ho ho ho.

What are you talking about so happily, Marjoram Sensei?
Can I join you?

Ah, Bergamot Sensei!
We were just talking about you—

W, wait, Marjoram Sensei!
Bergamot Sensei's smile is getting fierce!?

I'd like to talk to you... Let's find a place and sit down to have
a nice conversation... What about you guys?

Uh, b-but, we were just about to discuss a very interesting topic...
Ah, don't, don't drag me so hard...

Bergamot Sensei
was so scary just now...

No matter what, their relationship seems
to be very close...
VLOOKUP(テーブル6234[[#This Row],[引数2]],キャラID対応表!B$5:C$53,2,0)
